name: ruche
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tight fold in a piece of cloth, used as a decoration: The blouse is decorated with small ruches on the cuffs and neck. Silk curtains were gathered in great folds and ruches on either side of every window by fat tie-backs.
Zen Rial/Moment/Getty Images /GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI am zipped into a grey silk dress with purple ruches.His elegant indoor clothing was decorated with all manner of ruches, tassels and rosettes. Even the most voluminous ballgowns, although composed of hundreds of pleated ruches of silk tulle and organza, are almost weightless.
